input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: My decision has a direct effect on penguin mood and curly hair. Penguin mood has a direct effect on curly hair. For those who choose to take the stairs, the probability of curly hair is 53%. For those who choose to take the elevator, the probability of curly hair is 11%. Will taking the elevator decrease the chance of curly hair?
